entries.title: Tech Founder Wants $50 Million for Waterfront Home on Lake Tahoe
entries.description: Jeffrey Berns, CEO of Blockchains, is including furniture and a Cobalt boat in the sale price.

entries.title: Hallie Biden Recalls Discovery of Hunter's Gun in Wrenching Testimony: 'I Panicked.'
entries.description: Prosecutors have called a string of witnesses to speak about Hunter Biden’s addiction and drug-fueled partying.

entries.title: Hamas Leader Sinwar Holds Firm on Demands for Gaza Cease-Fire With Israel
entries.description: The group’s chief in Gaza issued his first response to a plan promoted by President Biden, as Palestinian officials accused Israel of killing dozens in an airstrike.

entries.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Settle Higher in Up-And-Down Trade
entries.description: U.S. natural gas futures settled higher in another volatile session marked by a larger-than-expected increase in underground storage for last week.

entries.title: SPDR Gold Rises After Global ETF Inflow Breaks Losing Streak
entries.description: Gold futures climbed 0.7% to settle at $2,370.30 an ounce, as exchange traded funds continued to buy in on lower U.S. Treasury yields.

entries.title: Russia Arrests French National Accused of Gathering Information About Its Military
entries.description: Russia arrested a French employee of a peace-building organization on an allegation of gathering information about its armed forces—the latest case of a foreign national detained by Moscow amid rising tensions with the West over the war in Ukraine.

entries.title: S&P 500 Slips After Hitting New Record
entries.description: U.S. stocks slipped after the ECB cut interest rates and as traders looked ahead to Friday’s jobs report.

entries.title: The Ruthlessness of Tennis's World No. 1
entries.description: Poland’s Iga Swiatek hasn’t lost a match at the French Open since 2021. Now, after steamrolling through her past three matches in barely three hours, she’s on the verge of a fifth major title.

entries.title: How Swans Stay White in Muddy Waters
entries.description: They use oil from a special gland and their own saliva to keep dirt off their feathers

entries.title: SEC Cyber Disclosures Delayed Several Times Since December
entries.description: The U.S. government has delayed public disclosures of cyber incidents several times since new rules came into force last December, a senior Justice Department official said.

entries.title: 'Roaring Kitty' Schedules Livestream Video for Friday
entries.description: Keith Gill has scheduled a livestream video for Friday at noon ET, according to his “Roaring Kitty” YouTube account.

entries.title: Justices Allow Insurers to Challenge Mass-Tort Bankruptcy Plans
entries.description: The Supreme Court ruled insurance carriers have legal standing to challenge bankruptcy plans involving large numbers of lawsuits, a win for insurers’ efforts to limit policy payouts on mass personal-injury claims.

entries.title: SpaceX Marks Milestone With Starship Re-Entry and Splashdown
entries.description: The Elon Musk-led company is developing the rocket for future missions, including NASA’s first astronaut trip to the moon in decades.

entries.title: God's Place in D-Day's Great Crusade
entries.description: Soldiers prayed, while leaders saw the war as an effort against a malign pagan enemy.

entries.title: Steve Bannon Ordered to Report to Prison on Contempt of Congress Conviction
entries.description: The former Trump adviser was convicted in 2022 for defying the House committee that investigated the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol attack.

entries.title: Meta Is Bringing Chatbots to WhatsApp in Test of AI Strategy
entries.description: Facebook parent plans to use new artificial intelligence features to amplify its efforts to generate revenue in messaging services.

entries.title: She Cooks Her Turkey Burgers in Duck Fat---and Wants You to Try It, Too
entries.description: Angela Davis, aka the Kitchenista, has a genius for taking foods we take for granted to the next level and stretching a grocery budget via sheer force of skill.

entries.title: Biden May Spur Another Netanyahu Comeback
entries.description: Israelis thought the prime minister was done for after Oct. 7. Now they see him as standing up to America.

entries.title: Want to Pay Cash? That'll Cost You Extra
entries.description: From ballpark hot dogs to parking tickets, more cash payments are coming with a fee.

entries.title: ECB Cut Should Boost Economy Despite Cautious Messaging
entries.description: The European Central Bank’s first interest-rate cut in five years will breathe life into an economy desperately needing some form of stimulus, says Lindsay James, investment strategist at Quilter Investors.
